page.title: 17College And Southern By-pass
page.content:
College:
The people of Easton have{little to {do}with the college. In the past any {trouble}has been{blamed}on the {college,}but recently two{Easton {youths}were found{guilty}of{stealing property from the college. There is a kind of{love/hate}relationship existing.
The Nowich Southern Bypass
In{1937}it was proposed that a new bypass should be made around Easton village.
The suggestions that were made for the routes inevitably pass through agricultural land, including the {Easton Lodge estate, the Agricultural {college and the Royal Showground.
